response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds significant value to me, but recognizing its potential worth to you, I am eager to make it available. I propose a purchase price of $1,200,000, aiming to ensure both a fair exchange and a mutually beneficial transaction. I trust this offer reflects my commitment to valuing your interest while also safeguarding the intrinsic worth of the product. I look forward to your consideration and response. Best regards, Alice", "product_price": 1200000}
